items.title: Mud Terrain
items.description: Mud Terrain tires offer drivers traction on off-road terrains such as mud, dirt, sand, gravel, and rock, and are commonly used on CUVs, SUVs, light trucks, and jeeps.

items.title: All Terrain
items.description: All-terrain tires offer drivers traction on- and off-road, and are typically used by light truck and SUV drivers who want a tire that's able to climb rocks and perform on the highway.

items.title: All Season
items.description: Most common: Good handle on dry, wet or snow

items.title: Highway
items.description: Highway terrain tires are commonly used on light trucks and SUVs that typically haul materials or need to conquer highways and some off-road terrains.

items.title: Winter
items.description: For snow, ice, and freezing temperatures

Check out the sale price on this tire

content.body:
### Shop 305/70R16 Tire Size
305/70R16 tires are made for light trucks and are available in All-Terrain, Mud-Terrain, All-Season, Highway, and Winter tire categories. A larger tire size, 305/70R16 tires are commonly used for off-road driving and feature extra-deep and bigger tread blocks for sure-footed traction in challenging conditions plus a reinforced construction for enhanced durability.

Mud-terrain tires and suited for off-road traction on terrains like mud, dirt, sand, gravel, and rock. To make the mud touring adventures effortless, you can consider the Toyo Open Country M/T,[Yokohama Geolandar M/T G003](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/geolandar-m-t-g003), or Nitto Mud Grappler as they offer solid off-roading performance.

All-terrain tires are designed for traction in both on- and off-road conditions. They feature an open-tread design like off-road tires while also offering good handling on paved roads. Take a look at the[Falken Wildpeak A/T3W](https://simpletire.com/brands/falken-tires/wildpeak-a-t3w), General Grabber A/TX or Crosswind A/T if you need an all-terrain tire that can deliver excellent on- and off-road performance.

Whether you need a mud-terrain, all-terrain, or another type of tire for your light truck, SimpleTire has a wide range of 305/70R16 tires that meet your needs at a greater price!

info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
